column4: I need some help upgrading firefox from 5.0.1 to 6.0 on ubuntu 9.10
I downloading the tar.gz but not sure what to do now...........or should I wait until the repository gets updated?
yeah i know 9.10 isn't supported anymore, but it took me forever to get my wifi working so I don't want to lose that
why not try a newer ubuntu as live-medium to check, if your wifi now works out-of-the-box?
